alert.note: Alert for Addison; Caledonia; Chittenden; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans; Rutland; Washington; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 16 at 9:21PM EDT until further notice by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York, including the following county, Essex. Portions of Vermont, including the following counties, Addison, Caledonia, Chittenden, Essex, Lamoille, Orleans, Rutland, Washington and Windsor. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 918 PM EDT, While heavy rain has ended, local law enforcement reported flooded roads and multiple road closures in the warned area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Essex Junction, Montpelier, St. Johnsbury, Burlington International Airport, Lyndon, Newport City, South Burlington, Burlington, Middlebury, Vergennes, Island Pond, Morrisville, Orleans, Derby Center, Worcester, Elmore, Middlesex, Calais, Morrisville Village and East Montpelier. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Addison; Caledonia; Chittenden; Essex; Lamoille; Orleans; Rutland; Washington; Windsor
